body:
* Enhancement in logging (plugin RPC responses are logged again)
* Silenced socket errors on plugin termination by @Mixaill in https://github.com/gogcom/galaxy-integrations-python-api/pull/188
* Added `internal_type` to errors' `data` members as a value used by Galaxy to identify original error raised on plugin side
* Changed error code number for `UnknownBackendResponse`
* Allowed specifying error `message` in error classes
* Removed `LoggedInElsewhere` error type

Internal
* Updated documentation dependencies
* Switched CI to Github Actions

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gogcom/galaxy-integrations-python-api/compare/0.68...0.69

- Skip logging API related DEBUG messages by default
- Add default `None` to optional parameters in `UserInfo` class

Added inadvertently missed feature from previous release:
- Import game sizes synchronously to optimize storage-based, asynchronous implementations on HDD

- Import game sizes synchronously to optimize storage-based, asynchronous implementations on HDD
- Update documentation for `get_local_size` to not return `0` for invalid cases, raise relevant error instead

- Bumped psutil >5.6.6 due to CVE-2019-18874
- Fix logging error on handling response from Galaxy Client
- Extended the Subscriptions interface with Subscription Discovery allowing for different subscription ownership detection methods

- Added interface to import platform subscriptions and subscription games
- Added interface to import size of local games
- Enhanced error logging in http module
* Relaxed dependency version requirements

* Add missing psutil setup requirement
* Log JSON-RPC response
* Do not send failure notifications while shutdown was requested
* Update sending data to GOG Galaxy Client

* Fix presence user id list parameter name
* Fix sending exceptions with custom data
* Fix logging in JSONRPC connection

* Add optional profile and avatar url
* Add updates for friends and presence
* Split presence_status into in_game_status and full_status
* Deprecate FriendInfo and replace it with UserInfo

* Add user presence import feature
* Fix edge cases of writing to client socket
* Fix edge case of plugin not closing when client closes.

* Add Rockstar platform
* Add OS compatibility import
* Add game library settings feature
* Added `RegistryMonitor`

* Fixed edge-case of plugin not shutting down when client crashes.
* Added more details to game time/achievements import errors.

Added new platform definitions:
-    Twitch
-    Minecraft
-    GameSessions
-    Nuuvem
-    FXStore
-    IndieGala
-    Playfire
-    Oculus
-    Test
* Changed `shutdown` method from synchronous to asynchronous (`async`)
* Added `launch_platform_client` method.
* Added `achievements_import_complete` and `game_times_import_complete` methods.

* Removed `start_achievements_import(self, game_ids)`, 
`import_games_achievements(self, game_ids)`, 
`get_unlocked_achievements(self, game_id)`, 
`game_achievements_import_success(self, game_id, achievements)`, 
`game_achievements_import_failure(self, game_id, error)` and 
`achievements_import_finished(self)`. Please use 
`prepare_achievements_context(self, 
game_ids)` and `
get_unlocked_achievements(self, game_id, context)` instead.
* Removed 
`start_game_times_import(self, game_ids)`, 
`import_game_times(self, game_ids)`, 
`get_game_times(self)`, 
`game_time_import_success(self, game_time)`, 
`game_time_import_failure(self, game_id, error)`, 
`game_times_import_finished(self)`. Please use 
`prepare_game_times_context(self, game_ids)` and 
`get_game_time(self, game_id, context)` instead.
* Deprecated `AsyncMock` and `coroutine_mock`. Please use `MagicMock` with `async_return_value` instead.
* Fixed exception handling in handshake.

- fix features detection
- add tools to handle process info

* Removed users and chat methods, notifications and types (the features will undergo changes in the future):
  * `get_users`
  * `send_message`
  * `mark_as_read`
  * `get_rooms`
  * `get_room_history_from_message`
  * `get_room_history_from_timestamp`
  * `update_room`
  * `Presence`
  * `UserInfo`
  * `Room`
  * `Message`
* Added `create_task` method.
* `WindowsProactorEventLoopPolicy` is used on Windows.
